title: About
paragraph: Yusuf Adisaputro is a highly skilled professional with expertise in team management, programming, web application architecture and design, and web application security. With years of experience in web development and API building, he has honed his programming abilities. He holds a degree in Computer Science from York University in Toronto, Canada. His experience in web application development encompasses a range of projects, including ERP systems, HRIS, Salesman Apps, Financing Apps, landing pages, and more.

education.name: York University
education.major: Bachelor of Arts in Computer Science
